archimate:Goal.name: All interfacing to third party clould systems must use API base integration functionality
archimate:Goal.documentation: Where operational processes depend on the transfer of data to and from external third party cloud systems, then API-based integration functionality is a pre-requisite, and such functionality will be requested from existing third party vendors so that data can be transferred automatically (e.g. Barclaycard, Fraedom, etc.) to drive down manual effort and human error.
